Our Projects

Line Follower Robot

A line follower robot is one of the simple robots that one use to start as their interest. It is a simple robot that can follow a colored line on a smooth surface of different color.

Maze Solver Robot

A Maze Solver Robot is an Autonomous Robot that is capable of finding the correct path to come out of a maze using an Algorithm.

Bootload Your Raw ATmega 328p

Bootloading your raw ATmega 328p IC can be tricky sometimes depending on the IC varients you get from the market. But here is what we know...

Proximity Sensors

A proximity sensor is a sensor able to detect the presence of nearby objects without any physical contact.

OUR TEAM

MAYANK

PROGRAMMER/DESIGNER
Converting innovative ideas to design. Interested in Embedded systems, PCB designing and Web Development. Founding Member of the Robotic Society "PHOENIX" of ZHDC, University of Delhi.

NITIN BISHT

PROGRAMMER
Problem Analyzing and Modelling through programming. Interested in Embedded Systems, Robotics and Programming. Founding Member of the Robotic Society "PHOENIX" of ZHDC, University of Delhi.

SAZID ALI

PRODUCT DESIGN HEAD
Diverse design knowledge from electrical and electronics field. Interested in wireless low power transmission and digital/anlaog circuit design. Founding Member of the Robotic Society "PHOENIX" of ZHDC, University of Delhi.
